results.title: Living Pictures Cinematograph: Climbing Billy Goat
results.brief_description: A flipbook / flick book of twenty-six pages designed in such a way that when flicked it creates a sense of movement, in this example, a goat climbs a ladder. Small outer corners lost from front cover.
